long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A state-of-the-art extension that let you have more cnotrol over GitLab-related things. You can quickly bookmark, control the GitPod pages, and even quickly clone the repository in no time. 

If you are on Windows and have Python and Git installed, then you can also utilize the Git Clone functionality right from this extension
